senses: [{"definition":"A state of being away or withdrawn from a place or from companionship; the period of being away.","example":"Absence makes the heart grow fonder."},{"definition":"Failure to be present where one is expected, wanted, or needed; nonattendance; deficiency.","example":null},{"definition":"Lack; deficiency; nonexistence.","example":"He had an absence of enthusiasm."},{"definition":"Inattention to things present; abstraction (of mind).","example":"absence of mind"},{"definition":"Temporary loss or disruption of consciousness, with sudden onset and recovery, and common in epilepsy.","example":null},{"definition":"Lack of contact between blades.","example":null}]
